title: Cannot connect into game. wasted an hour trying. tried through three games
body:
My internet is perfect, no issues with any other game.. League starts up patches perfectly fine, but when I try to play (after going through champ select) I don't even get into the loading screen.  The issue is it says Connection lost please check your connection and try again. I know for a fact my internet is perfect.

All i want to do is play league. im going to submit a support ticket, but i dont want to wait hours to get a response..
